audioText: Cette histoire était si invraisemblable qu'elle n'a jamais été crue par personne.
question: What happened to this unbelievable story?
options: It was never believed by anyone
It was widely shared on social media
explanation: The text states 'Cette histoire était si invraisemblable qu\'elle n\'a jamais été crue par personne' - This story was so unbelievable that it was never believed by anyone. 'Crue' is the feminine past participle of 'croire' (to believe), agreeing with the feminine noun 'histoire' (story) in this passive construction.
